title: Thanasis N
text:
A personal web page
This is a work in progress.
Here you can find some results of my work, and some info about me.






Last site updates were on:
2025-03-04, 2025-02-19, 2025-02-07, 2025-01-04, 2024-02-01, 2024-01-31

title: Works
text: My Google Scholar profile probably is more up to date.

title: Works
text:
Articles
Automated aerosol classification from spectral UV measurements using machine learning clustering.

title: Works
text:
Conferences
Retrieval of Aerosol Optical Depth in the UV from a single- and a double-monochromator Brewer spectrophotometer in Thessaloniki, Greece.
Athanasios Natsis, Ilias Fountoulakis, Nikolaos Siomos, Dimitrios Karagkiozidis, Theano Drosoglou, Charikleia Meleti and Alkiviadis Bais. EAC 2019. Article, Poster

Siomos N., Fountoulakis I, Natsis A, Karagiozidis D., Drosoglou T., Voudouri K. A., Bais A. and Balis D. COMECAP 2018. Article
Aerosol profile retrievals from O4 MAX-DOAS observations in Thessaloniki, Greece, and comparison with data from co-located lidar, Brewer and CIMEL.

Fountoulakis I., Natsis A., Siomos N., Drosoglou T., Bais A., Balis D. and Kazadzis S. COMECAP 2018. Article

Natsis A., Fountoulakis I., Siomos N., Drosoglou Th. and Bais A. COMECAP 2018. Article, Presentation

title: Codding
text:
I do data processing mainly with R.
I use bash more than I should, to glue everything together.
Occasionally will use python.
I have used julia, c++, octave, idl, fortran.
My main environment is Debian and I may migrate to nixOS someday.

title: About
text: About this site

title: Data display
text:
Here is the output of some of my projects.
Source code of the BBand_LAP: github.com/thanasisn/BBand_LAP
Here are all the reports monitoring the data processing of BBand_LAP:

title: Data display
text:
Clear sky identification
Plots of clear sky identification (CSid) algorithm results. Include both DNI and GHI, but the characterization is based only on GHI (v14.2):

CSid plots

title: Data display
text:
GHI, global horizontal solar radiation
Data from a CM-21 pyranometer.
Plots of the CM-21 pyranometer raw signal:

CM-21 signal plots 
Plots of the GHI from the CM-21 pyranometer:


CM-21 global radiation plots 



CM-21 view over the city

title: Data display
text:
DNI, direct normal solar radiation
Data from a CHP-1 pyrheliometer.
Plots of the CHP-1 pyrheliometer raw signal:

CHP-1 signal plots 
Plots of the DNI from the CHP-1 pyrheliometer:


CHP-1 direct irradiance plots 





CHP-1 tracking the Sun

title: Data display
text:
Broad-band signals plots
Plots of the recorded signal of each of the 8 channels/instruments. Each line is “free floating” in the figure, so there are no values on the y-axis. These data are un-managed and the plots may be incomplete. They are intended only for the acquisition process monitoring.

All broadband plots

title: Data display
section: Some results on the long term trends of GHI and other radiation
text:
Some results on the long term trends of GHI and other radiation
This is a reimplementation of the Trends from 30-Year Observations of Downward Solar Irradiance in Thessaloniki, Greece’ A. Natsis, A. Bais and C. Meleti (2023)
This is a work in progress!!
